fullplot: The story is about two swindlers who get their hands on a map to the fabled city of gold, El Dorado while pulling off some sort of scam. Their plan goes bad and the rogues end up lost at sea after a number of misfortunes. Oddly enough, they end up on the shores of El Dorado and are worshiped by the natives for their foreign appearance.
plot: Two swindlers get their hands on a map to the fabled city of gold, El Dorado.
title: The Road to El Dorado

tomatoes.consensus: Predictable story and thin characters made the movie flat.
